pages.text: $(l)INFORMATION: $(br)$()The Alphems are hostile creatures that usually swarms in groups. They could be dangerous to people with weak gear. $(br2)$(l)COUNTER AND WEAKNESS: $(br)$()It is best to get better gear to take them on as they form huge groups. Though, you can use some tactics like the usage of explosives, lava, fireworks, and more.
Crephoxls usually spawn in Taigas, Jungles, or Forests on both daytime and nighttime. Spawns more during night time.
